column2: Druids lead in passing down their ancient, strictly oral tradition to the next generation, by organising worship, sacrifice and divination. They are also consulted in matters both legal and judicial and act as medical prefessionals and advisors.
column3: Les druides transmettent leur ancienne tradition strictement orale à la génération suivante en organisant le culte, le sacrifice et la divination. Ils sont également consultés sur des questions juridiques et judiciaires et agissent en tant que pré-médecins et conseillers médicaux.
column4: Druiden führen dazu, dass sie ihre alte, streng mündliche Tradition an die nächste Generation weitergeben, indem sie Anbetung, Opfer und Weissagung organisieren. Sie werden sowohl in rechtlichen als auch in gerichtlichen Angelegenheiten konsultiert und fungieren als medizinische Fachleute und Berater.
column6: Los druidas llevan a transmitir su antigua tradición estrictamente oral a la siguiente generación, organizando la adoración, el sacrificio y la adivinación. También son consultados en asuntos tanto legales como judiciales y actúan como profesionales y asesores médicos.

column2: The personality and habits of this [GetDruidMaleFemale] are very inappropriate for [GetHerHis] position. And what's worse, [GetSheHe] has been unable to hide them from public view.
column3: La personnalité et les moeurs de ce[GetEEtte] [GetDruidMaleFemale] sont très inappropriées pour quelqu'un de sa fonction. Pire encore, [GetIlElle] est incapable de commettre ses actes impies discrètement.
column4: Die Persönlichkeit und Gewohnheiten [Getdiesesdieser] [GetDruidMaleFemale] sind äußerst unpassend für [GetHerHis]en Stand. Auch vermag [GetSheHe] es keineswegs, seine schlechten Eigenschaften vor der Allgemeinheit zu verbergen.
column6: La personalidad y hábitos de este sacerdote son muy inapropiados para esta posición. Y lo peor es que no es capaz de esconderlos en público.

column2: The most fearsome Gentlidecht warriors are said to have been gifted their javelins by Macha herself
column3: Les guerriers Gentlidecht les plus redoutables auraient été offerts à leurs javelins par Macha elle-même
column4: Die furchterregendsten Gentlidecht-Krieger sollen ihre Speere von Macha selbst geschenkt bekommen haben
column6: Se dice que los guerreros gentlidecht más temibles han sido dotados con sus jabalinas por la propia Macha.

column2: This character is a Féinnid, a veteran of the Fianna warbands.
column3: Cette personne est un Féinnid, un vétéran de la compagnie de Fianna.
column4: Dieser Charakter ist ein Féinnid, [Root.Geteineine] Veteran[Root.GetinFemale] der Fianna-Kriegsbande..
column6: Esta persona es un Féinnid, un veterano de la compañía Fianna.

column2: This character is nimbler than most and capable of deft, almost acrobatic moves.
This character can naturally use both hands with equal skill. As a result, they are more efficient in whatever they do, whether it is swinging swords or writing letters.
This character's voice is naturally soothing. While it is neither powerful nor melodious, its mildness can calm even the angriest of people, and slyly persuade even the most skeptical of men.
This character seems to be unable to properly control their limbs, and has a habit of awkwardly slipping, tripping or stumbling through many situations.

This character has been blessed with an agreable physique. While not necessarily a perfect beauty, their natural charms delight prospective partners, and have granted them a propensity for easily having children.
This character is said to have a pleasing voice, and can sing wonderfully. Somehow, when they talk, everyone simply listens.
This character possesses extraordinary sharp senses and can spot subtle nuances that others miss entirely.
This character speaks in an imposing tone that can persuade friends, frighten enemies, and inspire subordinates.
This character is of unusually tall and impressive stature.
This character is hard of hearing, which forms an obstacle in many situations.
This character has a naturally bright and merry temperament, and seems to always know a joke in every situation, whether appropriate or not.
This character has a tendency to get lost in sullen sulkiness, and rarely looks on the bright side of life. Their grumpy or gloomy attitude tends to repel other people.
This character prefers to apply logic and rational thinking in every situation. Humor and merriness to them seem like silly distractions from important problems.
